General.Name: Reysas Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS
General.Description: Reysas Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a privately owned real estate investment trust.  It invests in the real estate markets of Turkey. The firm invests in the warehousing market. Reysas Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

1.Name: Mr. Egemen  Doven
1.Title: Exec. Vice Chairman and Gen. Mang.
